DOC.brief_summary: A study determine lipid change effect MK0524A compare niacin extend release ( NIASPAN ) placebo .
DOC.criteria: Patients must age 18 70 year Female patient must premenopausal woman surgically sterilize , pregnant and/or planning become pregnant Patient history peptic ulcer gout Patient sensitive niacin product contain niacin Patient drink 2 alcoholic drink per day Patient certain heart disease , cancer , HIV positive
